generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, with vehicles and pedestrians on it.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, clearly separated from the road by curbs and occupied by pedestrians.
- building: A large, multi-story brick building with many windows is prominently visible on the right side of the street.
- wall: The stone wall on the far right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk, is an individual standing wall.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one in the foreground on the left and others along the sidewalk and near the buildings.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign with a white arrow pointing right is visible on a pole near the center of the image.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the sidewalk and in the background, providing shade and greenery.
- person: Multiple pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, including a man pushing a stroller and others walking or standing.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and a silver car is driving in the middle of the road.
- motorcycle: There is no motorcycle visible in the image.
